name.baseName: Raw material feeding ; Biological natural gas ; Biomass ; Anaerobic fermentation + biogas purification ; All sizes; NESPS2
原料进料 ; 生物天然气 ; 生物质 ; 厌氧发酵+沼气提纯 ; 所有规模 ; 采用粪便作为原料生产沼气或生物天然气，在进料工段的产污系数 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution BiomassisBiological filtration method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management67，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution BiomassisBiological filtration method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management67，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的过程涉及通过厌氧发酵将生物质转化为生物天然气，并与沼气净化结合，适用于所有规模的生产。这种生物转化技术在可再生能源生产和废物管理行业中被战略性地实施。此外，还采用了尾端处理技术——具体是生物过滤方法——来减少氢硫化物和氨的污染，这对于遵守排放标准和环境法规的设施至关重要。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码45,四级代码4513文件，在完整版文件中第2498页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution hydrogen sulfideisBiological filtration method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management67，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标硫化氢的末端治理技术是生物过滤法，其效率为67，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时/年）/（工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时/年））。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为硫化氢，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution ammoniaisBiological filtration method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标氨的末端治理技术是生物过滤法，其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时/年）/（工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时/年））。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氨，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为生物质，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
